text:
="preserve">Cakaudrove is a province in Fiji. It is on the island of Vanua Levu in the Northern Division. The province includes the islands of Taveuni, Rabi, Kioa, and many other islands in the Vanua Levu Group. The only major town is Savusavu.
It has a total land area of 2,816 square kilometers. About 50,000 people lived there in 2017.
